snippet: Chuck Hagel, the defense secretary, met with Turkish officials on Monday to persuade them to join the coalition being formed to fight the Sunni militant group.
abstract: Obama administration begins work of trying to determine what roles members of its fledgling coalition of countries to fight Islamic State in Iraq and Syria will play; Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel meets with leaders in Turkey, country that administration has called indispensable to the fight.
lead_paragraph: Chuck Hagel, the defense secretary, met with Turkish officials on Monday to persuade them to join the coalition being formed to fight the Sunni militant group.

headline.main: Turkey Is Courted by U.S. to Help Fight ISIS
headline.print_headline: Turkey Is Courted by U.S. to Help Fight ISIS

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
